abilities.name: Frost Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Frost Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Crushing Ice
